Hi Keenan, 

Apologies for the delay. I was meaning to speak to you about this one. 

Question, are these new colour codes replacing the existing ones, or are they additional to the existing ones? There are used in quite a few areas throughout the site, so I wanted to clarify.

Good morning Joel,

Hope you're well.

Just following up on the below. When can I expect these updates to be made?

Thanks Joel

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body: @heath Can we talk about this colour codes. Thanks!

Thanks Joel, Due to a change in color codes, can we update the following code on 25mm on wall and ceiling
  • Piano Black - BL25
  • Grey - GR25
  • White - WH25
And on 12mm on wall and ceiling
  • White - WH30
Thanks Warm regards, Keenan Druce Graphic Designer T +61 1800 626 462 Level 43, Australia Square, Sydney NSW 2000 acoufelt.com

Hi Keenan,

Sure, we have added the GREY on Filasorb 25. 
https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/full-color-panel/

Thanks Joel. Sorry I forgot to ask can we put Opus under 'Full Color' on the menu navigation. Can we just add in a few things
  • Under 'sustainability' can we add the attached logo
  • Shale colorway code is SH31
  • On the sample text page can we update to 'Opus - 12mm Slate chip (75 x 100mm)' instead of what we currently have (also attached)
  • Can we also update these 2 spec sheets for 12mm and 33mm
Warm regards, Keenan Druce Graphic Designer T +61 1800 626 462 Level 43, Australia Square, Sydney NSW 2000 acoufelt.com

Hi Keenan,

Sure, confirming we have updated the opus page. 
https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/opus-wall-panels/

Hey Heath, Just few minor things to fix
  • Hook & Loop sticker is on a few other pages for some reason
  • Update 'Sustainability' copy from 'Backing made from 80% min. recycled content' to 'Backing made from 60-80% min. recycled content'
  • NRC can we list it out similar to the 'Full Colour Panel' this is the NRC list 12mm - 0.45 - 0.85 (200mm air gap) - 33mm - 0.80 - 0.85 (20mm air gap)
  • Add QuickShip
Warm regards, Keenan Druce Graphic Designer T +61 1800 626 462 Level 43, Australia Square, Sydney NSW 2000 acoufelt.com

Hi Keenan, 

Sorry I just realised Joel had emailed you too! 

All good re downloads, we have added the existing Filasorb ones. 

Let's chat on this thread. My question:

Regarding the order of the swatches, we have left in the same order as the other full colour products. This does however differ to your artwork. Is the order in which we have them ok? We are trying to streamline wherever possible.
